name: ThemeService
usage: Allows live changing to the theme and font

variables.name: theme$
variables.text: An observable that emits each time the main theme is changed.

methods.name: setTheme
methods.text: Sets a theme, e.g. loads the corresponding CSS and adds it the the head. In case of a string, the full path of the theme has to be provided

methods.name: isMaterial
methods.text: Returns true if the current theme is Material, and false otherwise.

tokens.name: FRUTIGER
tokens.text: Defines if Frutiger font should be used. The alternative is Arial.
